summary: Provides an abstract base class that defines the common interface and data handling for 2‑D cross‑section plot styles used by MSS plot drivers. It encapsulates elevation, time, coordinate reference system information and driver configuration, serving as a foundation for concrete style implementations.
business_intent: Facilitate the development of consistent 2‑D cross‑section visualizations within the MSS web‑mapping service by supplying a reusable, extensible style framework that standardises handling of geographic and temporal metadata.
